title: Manage a Charity Ticket Donation
description: A local charity requests a donation of four tickets to an upcoming family show for their fundraising auction.

tasks.description: Receive and log the donation request from the charity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a record of the request.
Agent confirms the charity is a registered 501(c)(3).

tasks.description: Get approval from the community relations manager for the donation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent forwards the request and receives approval.

tasks.description: Issue a voucher for four tickets to the charity and mail it to them.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates and sends the ticket voucher.
